riddles.question: Enter the game code to begin
Find the square root of area wall A. Use blocks as units
Four the types of animals on the walls and shelves.  The 1st letter for each animal rearranged names a small decorative object.
The order of Math can be challenging.  This well know formula can be found in Entry 5 to get closer to your escape!
The key to this hiding place gives birth to big things.
riddles.hint: Don't crack up when you find it

riddles.question: This symbol is IRONic.  Twist the clue found below.
riddles.hint: I'm heavy in life! Spelled out, two words

riddles.question: As leader 44, he was born August 4. 12 months later the Taubinator was too.  Taubinator's year is a winning combination.
Motivation is your final key.  The first letter of all spells nonsense!
riddles.hint: You don't need any more hints at this point
